options.content:
This dashboard features a Timeliness computation of products published at the following interfaces for S1 mission:
 - DD DHUS, DAS.

Timeliness is computed from metadata attached to each DD product (Publication Date - Content Date/End (which is the end of sensing)).

Discrepancies are displayed through the following indicators:
 - Percent of products below timeliness threshold;
 - Average timeliness of products;
 - Time series of product displayed against the timeliness threshold;
 - Detailed list of product out of accepted range.

Information is available for each satellite managed by OMCS.

Tips:
 - Annotations are available on time series;
 - Satellite to consider can be selected in the upper bar.
 - Dissemination service to consider can be selected in the upper bar filter named "Dissemination service".

The information displayed was originally taken from Product at PRIP DD  

Time reference for this dashboard is : sensing_start_date

Important notice : Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query: from_sensing_timeliness: [0 TO 10800000000] AND service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT)

panels.title: NRT - From Sensing Dissemination over time

targets.query: from_sensing_timeliness: [0 TO 28800000000] AND service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NTC)
service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NTC)
service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NTC
service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NTC)

panels.title: NTC - From Sensing Dissemination over time

targets.query: from_sensing_timeliness: [0 TO 86400000000] AND service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NTC)
service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service} AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NTC)

list.definition: {"find":"terms","field":"product_type", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND product_level:$product_level  AND timeliness: $timeliness"}
list.label: Product Type
list.name: product_type
list.query: {"find":"terms","field":"product_type", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND product_level:$product_level  AND timeliness: $timeliness"}

list.definition: {"find":"terms","field":"datatake_id", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND timeliness: $timeliness AND cams_tickets: *"}
list.description:
Datatake ID with anomalies
All values mean no filter
list.label: Datatake ID with anomaly
list.name: datatake_id
list.query: {"find":"terms","field":"datatake_id", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND timeliness: $timeliness AND cams_tickets: *"}
